name: Peccadillo Pictures Ltd
goal: To distribute the best European Film and World Cinema titles to the UK and Republic of Ireland.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: We regularly participate with Creative Europe and sometimes receives grants and support for our films.
